item.title: The Norfolk Island Health Study
item.description: I’ve been lucky enough to work with the people of Norfolk Island since 2010 during my PhD through to present with aspects of my postdoc research. Norfolk Island is a remote island in the Pacific that has a unique and well-documented history and genealogy that makes its population an ideal candidate for genetic research. The finding of a population as genetically unique and geographically isolated as Norfolk Island is very rare and is therefore of vital importance in the field of human genetic research.
